entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 16 with temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 16 with temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early in the evening. Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 34 in the evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
